Own Choice Test Piece Contest
City Hall, Newcastle-upon-Tyne Result above as shown in column 2 page 13 Musical Progress and Mail July 1944. Column 1 same page by different correspondent gives result as - 1st Hetton, 2nd Boldon, 3rd Washington.
